subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Bob Bryan and John Isner defeated Nenad Zimonjic and Janko Tipsarevic, 7-6 (8), 5-7, 7-6 (8), 6-3, in doubles Saturday to cut host Serbia’s lead to 2-1 and keep the United States alive.
snippet: Bob Bryan and John Isner defeated Nenad Zimonjic and Janko Tipsarevic, 7-6 (8), 5-7, 7-6 (8), 6-3, in doubles Saturday to cut host Serbia’s lead to 2-1 and keep the United States alive.
